name: UMR - Ultra Mobile Turret
description:
Controls:
WASD - movement.
LMC - shoot Plasma (cost Energy).
RMC - install Speedgate (cost Energy).
Space - teleport Teleport (cost Momentum).
Q - freeze Time (cost Structure, add Momentum).
E - repair Structure (cost all Energy and Momentum, add Structure).

Mechanic / resource management:
On move, you generate Energy.
On standing, you generate Momentum.
On standing and not shooting, you regenerate Structure.
More Energy === more damage.
More Momentum === more speed.
Speedgate incriase Plasma projectile speed AND reflect enemies bullets (and...?).

Plot:
The Earth has been invaded.
Humanity is on the brink of destruction.
The only chance of victory is that the Ultra Mobile Turret, a unique prototype, will destroy the Alien Leader. 
But that mechanism is a little unfinished.
...sequel of OBSD, and the finale (?).

Special for NYU Game Design 2023 - Week 4: Resource Systems (game made in one day).
Engine:   KaboomJS (https://kaboomjs.com/)
Art:  https://somefarang.itch.io/ and https://kenney.nl/
Tiles: https://opengameart.org/ and Viktor Hahn (Viktor.Hahn@web.de) ...with online tilemap editor http://riskylab.com/tilemap/
Music:  https://joshuuu.itch.io/
SFX:   jsfxr(https://sfxr.me/)
